1370: Ricmoden was born in Davids hof in 1370.
Got married to Vais at age 23 in 1370.
Gave birth to Berta in 1370 at age 23.
1371: Gave birth to Leanne in 1371 at age 24.
1372: Gave birth to Liedelde in 1372 at age 25.
1373: Gave birth to Tetta in 1373 at age 26.
1374: Lost daughter Berta when Berta was 5 years old.
1377: Gave birth to Uergina in 1377 at age 30.
1379: Gave birth to Folqui in 1379 at age 32.
1382: Lost daughter Uergina when Uergina was 6 years old.
1385: Gave birth to Waldrada in 1385 at age 38.
